item.title: Git Commands Cheat Sheet: 50+ Commands Every Developer Must Know
item.description:
Ever been in the middle of coding and suddenly forgot that one Git command you needed? Or confused about when to use git reset vs git revert? Yeah, we’ve all been there.

I put together this cheat sheet as a quick reference you can bookmark. It has 50+ Git commands I actually use on a daily basis - from the basics to some advanced stuff. No fluff, just the commands and what they do.
